messages.message: In *Workspaces*, on the *Create* tab (and maybe also *Deploy* and *Review)* do we have filtering on the roadmap? I would really like to be able to filter for my projects/convos.
What sort of filters are you looking for?

Mainly I would like to be able to filter by my stuff: my projects/convos. I guess we already have filters for all the other facets I can think of: workspace, recency, and asset type.

Then again, maybe the homepage is meant to be the "my stuff" filter? I just never use the homepage as my starting point.

Ah so like a "Created by me" filter? My first reaction is that you could go to "My workspace" and everything in there would be created by you, and within a shared workspace it shouldn't matter as much what's created by you, since the purpose is collaboration. @hannah do you have thoughts here?

I'll add to this that most customers we've spoken to aren't big fans of each user having their own 'my workspace' since it can create problems for consumption tracking & losing work if someone leaves/is OOO, so we're likely going to add an org-level setting to disable these.

Not a bad idea to add more filtering to those tabs though & make the user that created/last updated the project accessible. Is there a particular workspace on prod that was difficult to navigate?

Each card does say the last user it was edited by.

I'm also curious whether this is a specifically IB user problem though - like if we're not collaborating as much or being as intentional with where we put our assets as external users might be
This could totally be an IB problem. We have about 45 "New projects" in Workspaces. It's possible most IRL users wouldn't have access to so many workspaces.
And they might be more intentional about actually naming their projects haha - I know I create a lottttt of "New project (X)" which make things really hard to find
In any case, sounds like this is not on the roadmap and I might be using it wrong. :themoreyouknow: I'll try just changing my bookmark to the homepage.

Or to your personal workspace, and try to create your projects in there! Or if the docs team collaborates a lot, a shared workspace for you all that you all try to keep cleaner. Would love to have people making more use of the permissioning structure!
